amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the participation of Iraq in the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available in the bill from being used for the participation of Iraq in the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
